body_html: It sounds like the reinitializable iterator is working as intended (resetting to its initial state when you run the initializer). You should use the feedable iterator if you want to switch between two iterators without resetting. Feedable iterators work with both one-shot and initializable iterators. Feel free to reopen the bug if the feedable iterators aren't working as expected.

You should use the feedable iterator if you want to switch between two iterators without resetting. Feedable iterators work with both one-shot and initializable iterators.
